content: on needle 2 this is the top of the sock now work across in the rib pattern k3 p1 closing the toe continuing on with the working yarn and with the free dpn pick knit the stitches from needle 3 onto needle 1 up 15 stitches up the other side of the heel flap one stitch in each 12 sts on each of 2 dpns slipped stitch knit across 7 stitches from the heel turn cut the yarn leaving an 8 inch end place the end on a yarn place the remaining 7 stitches on the next dpn needle graft the toe closed using the kitchener stitch for an instructional video on kitchener stitch on a new stitch arrangement as follows sock toe look here needle 1 22 stitches http //susanbanderson blogspot com/2007/08/kitchener stitch needle 2 24 stitches rib pattern demo withyarntini html needle 3 22 stitches © 2012 this pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way spud and chloë and the spud and chloë characters are trademarks and copyrights of blue sky alpacas increase 013012
